title: UPDATE 4-English County Championship Division One Scoreboard
text: April 20, 2018 / 5:32 PM / Updated 24 minutes ago UPDATE 4-English County Championship Division One Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Apr 20 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at stumps on the first day of between Somerset and Worcestershire on Friday at Taunton, England Worcestershire trail Somerset by 49 runs with 2 wickets remaining Somerset 1st innings Marcus Trescothick lbw Steve Magoffin 1 Edward Byrom c Ben Cox b Joe Leach 4 Matthew Renshaw Not Out 101 James Hildreth c Joe Clarke b Ed Barnard 48 Tom Abell lbw Ed Barnard 10 Steve Davies c Daryl Mitchell b Joe Leach 9 Lewis Gregory b Ed Barnard 2 Craig Overton c Ben Cox b Ed Barnard 0 Josh Davey lbw Ed Barnard 4 Jack Leach c Ben Cox b Josh Tongue 4 Tim Groenewald c Ben Cox b Josh Tongue 2 Extras 9b 5lb 2nb 0pen 1w 17 Total (56.1 overs) 202 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-1 Trescothick, 2-7 Byrom, 3-99 Hildreth, 4-134 Abell, 5-163 Davies, 6-170 Gregory, 7-176 Overton, 8-182 Davey, 9-197 Leach, 10-202 Groenewald Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Joe Leach 15 3 61 2 4.07 Steve Magoffin 10 4 26 1 2.60 Josh Tongue 14.1 0 42 2 2.96 Ed Barnard 16 3 52 5 3.25 1w 1nb Travis Head 1 0 7 0 7.00 Worcestershire 1st innings Daryl Mitchell c James Hildreth b Lewis Gregory 5 Brett D'Oliveira b Lewis Gregory 3 Tom Fell lbw Josh Davey 21 Joe Clarke lbw Lewis Gregory 0 Travis Head b Josh Davey 49 George Rhodes c Edward Byrom b Craig Overton 1 Ben Cox c Marcus Trescothick b Tim Groenewald 21 Ed Barnard Not Out 27 Joe Leach c Matthew Renshaw b Josh Davey 8 Josh Tongue Not Out 7 Extras 5b 6lb 0nb 0pen 0w 11 Total (39.0 overs) 153-8 Fall of Wickets : 1-12 Mitchell, 2-17 D'Oliveira, 3-17 Clarke, 4-47 Fell, 5-48 Rhodes, 6-93 Cox, 7-112 Head, 8-124 Leach To Bat : Magoffin Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Lewis Gregory 12 3 43 3 3.58 Craig Overton 11 2 35 1 3.18 Josh Davey 10 1 38 3 3.80 Tim Groenewald 6 1 26 1 4.33 Umpire Ian Gould Umpire Steve O'Shaughnessy Home Scorer Polly Rhodes Away Scorer Phillip Mellish
